title: lint: apply strict clippy rules to crate roots
description:
Goal:
Apply strict lint attributes to all crate roots and remove disallowed unwrap/expect/panic usage; ensure panic=abort profiles set. Investigate missing macOS/iOS/Linux targets and note findings.
Definition of Done:
- All crate roots updated with lint attributes per AGENTS.md.
- No unwrap/expect/panic in code paths.
- Workspace profiles set to panic abort.
- Provide explanation for macOS/iOS/Linux target handling.
Notes:
- Use allow attributes only if unavoidable (e.g., required FFI).

title: project: initialize rust port scaffold
description:
Goal:
Create a new Rust project in D:\RChoreoApp\ as the starting point for a port of D:\ChoreoApp\.
Definition of Done:
- Rust project initialized in D:\RChoreoApp\.
- User can build/run the new project.
Notes:
- Follow AGENTS.md and beads workflow.

title: app: create Slint hello world for all targets
description:
Goal:
Create a Slint hello world app that runs on Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS, and Web WASM, with per-target apps if needed and shared code in a crate.
Definition of Done:
- Workspace builds hello world app(s) for each target or target-specific crates.
- Shared code extracted to a library crate if multiple apps.
- Basic run instructions noted.
Notes:
- Use Slint for UI.
- Consider per-target crates for platform differences.

title: lint: enable clippy all in crate roots
description:
Goal:
Enable #![deny(clippy::all)] in all crate roots and remove redundant clippy denies covered by it; update AGENTS.md guidance.
Definition of Done:
- All crate roots include #![deny(clippy::all)].
- Redundant clippy deny attributes removed.
- AGENTS.md linting section updated accordingly.
